zh.Detail.index.786732-19: 证书由受信任的数字证书颁发机构CA，在验证服务器身份后颁发，具有服务器身份验证和数据传输加密功能，保障设备与平台间的数据传输安全。配置后可被网络组件引用。
zh.Detail.index.786732-22: 您可以使用文本编辑工具打开PEM格式的证书文件，复制其中的内容并粘贴到该文本框，或者单击该文本框下的上传，并选择存储在本地计算机的证书文件，将文件内容上传到文本框。
zh.Detail.index.786732-24: 填写证书私钥内容的PEM编码。
zh.Detail.index.786732-25: 您可以使用文本编辑工具打开KEY格式的证书私钥文件，复制其中的内容并粘贴到该文本框，或者单击该文本框下的上传并选择存储在本地计算机的证书私钥文件，将文件内容上传到文本框。

en.Detail.index.786732-4: Up to 64 characters can be entered
en.Detail.index.786732-6: Please input or upload a file
en.Detail.index.786732-13: Please enter the certificate private key
en.Detail.index.786732-15: Up to 200 characters can be entered
en.Detail.index.786732-19: The certificate is issued by a trusted digital certificate authority (CA) after verifying the server identity. It has server authentication and data transmission encryption functions to ensure the security of data transmission between devices and platforms. After configuration, it can be referenced by network components.
en.Detail.index.786732-22: You can use a text editing tool to open a certificate file in PEM format, copy its contents and paste them into the text box, or click 'Upload' under the text box and select the certificate file stored on your local computer to upload the file content to the text box.
en.Detail.index.786732-24: Fill in the PEM code of the certificate private key content.
en.Detail.index.786732-25: You can use a text editing tool to open a certificate private key file in KEY format, copy its contents and paste them into the text box, or click "Upload" under the text box and select the certificate private key file stored on the local computer to upload the file content to the text box.
